column4: I could need some help... Could anyone point me to a nice howto for using ubuntu as ISDN answering machine and fax(server)?
dows anyone know how to compile AVM-Fritz-Drivers? I'm getting error 2 due to missing kernel sources. But I don't know where to get the right version.
did linux-headers pull the correct version for you?
(I don't know if it's a virtual package)
In which directory do I have to build, Bazzi?
no, sorry, sudo aptitude install build-essential
okay, success. But error 2 still occurs "/lib/modules/2.6.15-26-286/build - no such file or directory
I had that, too, once, something must still be missing
do a sudo aptitude install linux-headers-2.6.15-26-386 linux-headers-2.6.15-26-686
